scripts.run:smoke: npm run clean:results && dotenv -- npx playwright test --project=API --grep "(?=.*@smoke)"
scripts.report:smoke: dotenv -- npx @testiny/cli automation -P 1 --junit results.xml --run-title-pattern "Smoke Test - %{date} %{time}" --junit-classname-as-folder single
scripts.run:full_reg: npm run clean:results && dotenv -- npx playwright test --project=API --project=chromium --project=firefox --project=edge --grep "(?=.*@regression)"
scripts.run:sestavy_reg_full: npm run clean:results && dotenv -- npx playwright test --grep "(?=.*@sestavy)(?=.*@regression)"
scripts.report:sestavy_reg_full: dotenv -- npx @testiny/cli automation -P 1 --junit results.xml --run-title-pattern "Sestavy - Full Regression - %{date} %{time}"
scripts.run:sestavy_api: npm run clean:results && dotenv -- npx playwright test --project=API --grep "(?=.*@sestavy)(?=.*@API)"
scripts.report:sestavy_api: dotenv -- npx @testiny/cli automation -P 1 --junit results.xml --run-title-pattern "Sestavy - API Tests - %{date} %{time}"
scripts.run:sestavy_e2e: npm run clean:results && dotenv -- npx playwright test --project chromium --project firefox --project edge --grep "(?=.*@sestavy)(?=.*@E2E)"
scripts.report:sestavy_e2e: dotenv -- npx @testiny/cli automation -P 1 --junit results.xml --run-title-pattern "Sestavy - E2E Tests - %{date} %{time}"
scripts.run:sestavy_regression: npm run clean:results && dotenv -- npx playwright test --project=API -- npx playwright test --project chromium --project firefox --project edge --grep "(?=.*@sestavy)(?=.*@regression)"
scripts.report:sestavy_regression: dotenv -- npx @testiny/cli automation -P 1 --junit results.xml --run-title-pattern "Sestavy - Kompletní regrese - %{date} %{time}"
scripts.run:reg_receipts: npm run clean:results && dotenv -- npx playwright test --project=API --grep "(?=.*@receipts)(?=.*@regression)(?=.*@API)"
scripts.run:skladoveKarty_api: npm run clean:results && dotenv -- npx playwright test --project=API --grep "(?=.*@StockCards)(?=.*@API)"
scripts.report:skladoveKarty_api: dotenv -- npx @testiny/cli automation -P 1 --junit results.xml --run-title-pattern "Skladove karty - API Tests - %{date} %{time}"
scripts.run:CDL_regression: npm run clean:results && dotenv -- npx playwright test --project=API --project=chromium --project=firefox --project=edge --grep "(?=.*@CDL)(?=.*@regression)"
scripts.report:CDL_regression: dotenv -- npx @testiny/cli automation -P 1 --junit results.xml --run-title-pattern "Čerpadlové dodací listy -regresní testy - %{date} %{time}"
